questions.questionText: Assume the mains supply voltage is $!$230\,\text{V}$!$ and the resistance of wet human skin is $!$1\,\text{k}\Omega$!$. Calculate the current that would pass through a student's body if they touched the live part of an appliance with wet skin. Express your answer in amperes.
